short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly and easily resize the browser text up to 200%

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly and accurately resizes the text on a website. This extension accurately emulates the native functionality of the browser to only resize text up to 200%.
